text: Stephen Young (born 7 June 1969) is a British professional stock car racing driver. He last competed part-time in the Xfinity Series, driving the No. 78 Chevrolet Camaro for B. J. McLeod Motorsports. ==Racing career== ===Xfinity Series=== Young's No. 78 at Road America Young made his Xfinity debut at Watkins Glen, driving the No. 78 car for B.J. McLeod Motorsports. He started 39th and finished 36th after a transmission failure. Young drove again for the team at Mid-Ohio. He started 37th and finished 24th, which was a significant improvement on his last race. He drove once again at Road America, starting 36th and finishing 34th, 3 laps down. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
